component.description: Menu is a navigation component with various customized modes like multi tiers, ipod style sliding and overlays.
component.attributes:
&standard_uicomponent_attributes; &widget_var_attribute;
model false com.blazebit.blazefaces.model.MenuModel A menu model instance to create menu programmatically.
trigger false java.lang.String Id of component whose click event will show the dynamic positioned menu.
my false java.lang.String Corner of menu to align with trigger element.
at false java.lang.String Corner of trigger to align with menu element.
overlay false java.lang.Boolean false Defines positioning, when enabled menu is displayed with absolute positioning relative to the trigger. Default is false, meaning static positioning.
style false java.lang.String Inline style of the main container element.
styleClass false java.lang.String Style class of the main container element.
triggerEvent false java.lang.String click Event name of component that will show the dynamic positioned menu. Default is click.
